website_summaries.verdict: This ball does a great job protecting kids and adults from bumps, tumbles, and falls.
pros: Includes ball, patch kit, and manual
cons: It can be hard for smaller children to stand back up in these once they are knocked over, so be prepared to help

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely great fun for kids & adults. However, you need LOTS of space to fully enjoy them & then you need LOTS of storage, especially if you don't want to completely deflate them between use. And that storage needs to protected from things that could puncture & damage them. They appear to be made of strong quality materials. I do have a concern that when the kids flip over in them, they were often landing on their heads/necks. Helmets weren't suggested, but I think they should be used.
customer_reviews.author: mbc

customer_reviews.title: So fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Huge success! My kids ages 5-17 all love playing with these. Even my husband and I have had fun with them. We got two and it makes for a really fun time. Just so happy they are outside playing with each other instead of inside watching tv. They have held up really well so far and we have had many teenage boys playing pretty hard with them. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: D. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Thick heavy plastic, good quality
customer_reviews.text: These balls are very well made. I purchased two of them for my 4 grandkids age 10-13. They had fun playing in them. The only issue is they are heavy and hard for the younger ones to stand up. But that is ok because the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Nanaof6blessed

customer_reviews.title: sturdy. great fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.text: got these for a work event. they continue to be enjoyed by all ages.
customer_reviews.author: danfromsanfran

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: This ball is incredible. My nephews wanted to leave Christmas dinner just to go home and inflate it. They did and haven't stopped yet.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Durable material, Solid Construction and Design!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive! Ordered a red and a blue one recently for my daughters 11th birthday party. They were definitely the hit of the party. Solid construction and design. I was a little worried about them holding up to the abuse of some pretty wild 11-13yr olds, but they took it well and showed no signs of failing after the fun-filled 2 hours of use by a dozen somewhat unsupervised kids. Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: bla

customer_reviews.title: damaged products
customer_reviews.text: i had issues with mine. I have ordered 10 of them and 5 of the 10 had half circle holes in the grooves by the time I received them being in south korea it was passed the time for the return limits. I am very disappointed because these are clearly manufacture errors
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Great gift. Lots of fun for all who play. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and could/did handle adults no holds bar bounce war!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Very Satusfied Customet!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 6 for Christmas gifts for our grandchildren. I never saw such excitement! They inflated them and went outside...even in snow. Then down to the basement! These are unique, safe, and loads of fun. Working with Holleyweb was a perfect buying experience. My questions were answered immediately. The items were packed and shipped securely, and they arrived faster than expected. The quality is excellent, and I highly recommend this company and their products.
customer_reviews.author: Roni F.

customer_reviews.title: not to use shoulder straps. this is a weak point and where they tear.
customer_reviews.text: After 20 minutes one of the balls had a leak, and they didn't use them
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Fun and safe for all.
customer_reviews.text: The soccer balls were heavy duty and durable. We had a house party for adults and they were a blast 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! I bought a few different brands this summer and these are the largest, most comfortable and most durable. I've learned that it's important to have a snug fit (or else you go flying around on the inside when you get hit). This is large enough for my XL hustband but still fun for my young kids. Perfect for the whole family! AND they're still inflated whereas other brands I was constantly needing to refill. A larger investment for sure but I'll be able to use these for several years (I've already tossed one set of a less expensive brand).
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my little brothers. They are the hit of the neighborhood, everyone loves playing with the bubbles. The company is great to work with and quick to answer every question, comment, or concern. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Marzen

product_meta.title: Holleyweb Red Bubble Soccer Ball Dia 5' (1.5m) Human Inflatable Bumper Bubble Balls
product_meta.description:
Bubble Soccer is the perfect sport to learn the game of soccer, and people can get more out of the sport than what people would get in traditional soccer. This game is very fast paced since there is less schemes and rules to the game which allows for flexibility to the player to simply read and react. You are playing soccer but you are also carrying an inflatable ball on your shoulders which allows you to bump, roll and flip down the field as you laugh and enjoy the game of soccer with your friends. But please don't worry about the risk of an injury since you're in a bubble and the majority of your body is protected from immediate harm. However it is not only perfect for soccer but also many types of activities: Body zorb Football ,Last man standing ,Body Zorb sumo ,Body Zorb Tag ,British Bull dog etc. These interesting games surely will get you put down TV remote and electronic devices to go out and exercise.

Specifications:
- Material: 0.8MM PVC, durable, nontoxic, washable and reusable
- Dia: 5' (1.5m) /4'(1.2m) 
-Height: 4'3"(128cm) / 3'6" (105cm) 
- Inner Dia: 24"(60cm) / 20" (50cm) 
- High Quality D type Hander
- Life Time: 3 to 5 years

Recommendations: 
5' Bubble ball is suitable for players from 5' to 6'2", body weight no more than 200lb
4' Bubble ball is suitable for players from 4' to 5', ages 8 and up
Application: Swimming Pool, Beach, Water Park, Lake, River, Shoaling Water, Advertising Display, Etc
feature_bullets: Material: 0.8MM PVC, durable, nontoxic, washable and reusable
Application: swimming pool, beach, water park, lake, river, shoaling water, advertising display, etc
Package Contains: bubble ball, patch kit, manual
